description: Ex-taoiseach Bertie Ahern also says Stormont could move to a voluntary coalition "in time".
title: Fianna F¨¢il-Fine Gael merger possible, says Ahern
title_page: Fianna F¨¢il-Fine Gael merger possible, says Ahern - BBC News
maintext: The interview, broadcast on 12 July, reminded Mr Ahern, he said, of the occasion he and the late Rev Ian Paisley, the former DUP leader, cut the ribbon to open a visitor and heritage centre at the site of the Battle of the Boyne in 2008.
